services.title: Dry Cleaning
services.description: Expert care for your finest garments using eco-friendly solvents.

services.title: Expert Alterations
services.description: 4 full-time tailors for perfect fits and custom alterations.

services.title: Wedding Gowns
services.description: Specialized cleaning and preservation for your special day.

services.title: Leather & Suede
services.description: Professional care for delicate leather and suede items.

services.title: Household Items
services.description: Drapes, comforters, rugs, and other household textiles.

services.title: Free Pickup & Delivery
services.description: Convenient service to your home or office at no extra charge.

content.about: Since 1968, Highland Cleaners has been the trusted choice for Louisville families seeking exceptional garment care. What began as a single family-owned location has grown into 12 convenient locations across the Louisville metro area, while maintaining our commitment to quality, service, and environmental responsibility.
content.history: Three generations of the Highland family have built our reputation on attention to detail, expert craftsmanship, and genuine care for our customers and their garments.
